ResumeParserData.Experience: NatWest Group Lead PEP & High Risk Analyst  Manchester, UK  2017 - Present  Lead a team of analysts in conducting enhanced due diligence on high-risk clients, including PEPs. Develop and implement risk assessment frameworks to ensure compliance with AML regulations and internal policies. Key Achievements :   Enhanced the efficiency of the EDD process, reducing assessment time by 25%.  Successfully mitigated significant financial crime risks through in-depth investigations.  Provided training and mentorship to junior analysts, improving overall team performance.  Lloyds Banking Group PEP & High Risk Analyst  Manchester, UK  2013 - 2017  Conducted enhanced due diligence and risk assessments on high-risk clients and PEPs. Worked closely with compliance and legal teams to ensure regulatory compliance and effective risk management.  Key Responsibilities :   Performed detailed due diligence on high-risk clients, identifying potential financial crime risks.  Prepared comprehensive risk assessment reports for senior management.  Assisted in the development and implementation of AML policies and procedures.  Monitored client transactions for suspicious activities and potential risks.  HSBC Bank AML Compliance Analyst  Manchester, UK  2010 - 2013  Supported the AML compliance team by conducting due diligence and monitoring transactions for suspicious activities. Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements and internal policies.  Key Contributions :   Conducted due diligence on new and existing clients, identifying and mitigating potential AML risks.  Analyzed transaction patterns to detect signs of money laundering and other financial crimes.  Assisted in the preparation of compliance reports for senior management and regulatory authorities.  Participated in regular training sessions to stay updated on AML regulations and best practices.

JobProfile.Title: Lead PEP & High Risk Analyst
JobProfile.Alias: risk score analyst, analyst - risk, risk analyser, analyst risk, rco risk control analyst, risk advisory analyst, riskcontrol analyst, risk -analyst, analyst of risk, analyst - risk management, risk concurrence analyst, risk services specialist, risk control analyst, risk-analyst, risk strategy analyst, business risk analyst, risk management analyst, risk management -analyst, risk monitoring analyst, risk and controls analyst, analyst - risk assurance, analyst - risk advisory

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Lead a team of analysts in conducting enhanced due diligence on high-risk clients, including PEPs. Develop and implement risk assessment frameworks to ensure compliance with AML regulations and internal policies. 
 
 Key Achievements : 
 Enhanced the efficiency of the EDD process, reducing assessment time by 25%. 
 Successfully mitigated significant financial crime risks through in-depth investigations. 
 Provided training and mentorship to junior analysts, improving overall team performance.

JobProfile.Title: PEP & High Risk Analyst
JobProfile.Alias: risk score analyst, analyst - risk, risk analyser, analyst risk, rco risk control analyst, risk advisory analyst, riskcontrol analyst, risk -analyst, analyst of risk, analyst - risk management, risk concurrence analyst, risk services specialist, risk control analyst, risk-analyst, risk strategy analyst, business risk analyst, risk management analyst, risk management -analyst, risk monitoring analyst, risk and controls analyst, analyst - risk assurance, analyst - risk advisory

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Conducted enhanced due diligence and risk assessments on high-risk clients and PEPs. Worked closely with compliance and legal teams to ensure regulatory compliance and effective risk management. 
 Key Responsibilities : 
 Performed detailed due diligence on high-risk clients, identifying potential financial crime risks. 
 Prepared comprehensive risk assessment reports for senior management. 
 Assisted in the development and implementation of AML policies and procedures. 
 Monitored client transactions for suspicious activities and potential risks.

Supported the AML compliance team by conducting due diligence and monitoring transactions for suspicious activities. Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements and internal policies. 
 Key Contributions : 
 Conducted due diligence on new and existing clients, identifying and mitigating potential AML risks. 
 Analyzed transaction patterns to detect signs of money laundering and other financial crimes. 
 Assisted in the preparation of compliance reports for senior management and regulatory authorities. 
 Participated in regular training sessions to stay updated on AML regulations and best practices.

ResumeParserData.Summary: Experienced PEP & High Risk Analyst with 14 years of expertise in banking and financial services. Specializes in conducting comprehensive due diligence, assessing financial crime risks, and ensuring compliance with global AML regulations. Adept at leveraging analytical skills to identify and mitigate potential threats.
ResumeParserData.ExecutiveSummary: Liam has an experience in the domain of 'Finance and Insurance', particularly in the sub-domain of 'Compliance Officers. The candidate has been working as a Lead PEP & High Risk Analyst at NatWest Group for the last 7.7 years.
ResumeParserData.ManagementSummary: Currently, Liam holds a Low Management Level position, as Lead PEP & High Risk Analyst at NatWest Group. from 01/01/2017 to 05/07/2024. The candidate has a total experience of 7.7 years in this company.

Lead a team of analysts in conducting enhanced due diligence on high-risk clients, including PEPs. Develop and implement risk assessment frameworks to ensure compliance with AML regulations and internal policies.
Key Achievements : 
Enhanced the efficiency of the EDD process, reducing assessment time by 25%.
Successfully mitigated significant financial crime risks through in-depth investigations.
Provided training and mentorship to junior analysts, improving overall team performance.
Lloyds Banking Group PEP & High Risk Analyst
Manchester, UK
2013 - 2017
Conducted enhanced due diligence and risk assessments on high-risk clients and PEPs. Worked closely with compliance and legal teams to ensure regulatory compliance and effective risk management.

Key Contributions : 
Conducted due diligence on new and existing clients, identifying and mitigating potential AML risks.
Analyzed transaction patterns to detect signs of money laundering and other financial crimes.
Assisted in the preparation of compliance reports for senior management and regulatory authorities.
Participated in regular training sessions to stay updated on AML regulations and best practices.
